metaTitle: PLAYA PRINCIPE La Manga del Mar Menor | From €205,033
metaDescription: Discover PLAYA PRINCIPE by ORMANDA in La Manga del Mar Menor. 1-3 bed apartments from €205,033. Delivery June 2026. Blue Flag beaches, golf courses nearby.

content.heroIntro:
Welcome to PLAYA PRINCIPE, an exceptional residential development by ORMANDA nestled in the heart of La Manga del Mar Menor, one of Spain's most sought-after coastal destinations. This stunning collection of 1-3 bedroom apartments, priced from €205,033, offers an unparalleled opportunity to own a modern home in a thriving international community. With delivery scheduled for June 1st, 2026, PLAYA PRINCIPE combines contemporary design, premium finishes, and strategic location to create the perfect blend of lifestyle and investment potential.

Located in La Manga del Mar Menor, Murcia, PLAYA PRINCIPE benefits from a unique position between the Mediterranean Sea and the Mar Menor lagoon. The development features apartments ranging from 78 to 130 square meters, each designed with meticulous attention to detail and quality construction standards. ORMANDA, a trusted developer with extensive experience in the region, ensures every property meets the highest standards of comfort and durability.

Whether you're seeking a primary residence, vacation home, or investment property, PLAYA PRINCIPE delivers exceptional value in one of Europe's most dynamic coastal markets. The established international community speaks English widely, making it an ideal choice for foreign buyers seeking a seamless transition to Spanish coastal living.

locationSection.intro: La Manga del Mar Menor stands as a distinctive and captivating coastal destination on Spain's southeastern coast in Murcia. This unique geographical location features a narrow strip of land separating the Mediterranean Sea from the shallow, warm waters of the Mar Menor lagoon, creating an exceptional environment for beach lovers and water sports enthusiasts. The region has evolved into a cosmopolitan hub with a well-established international community, where English is commonly spoken and expatriate networks thrive. La Manga's appeal extends beyond its stunning beaches—it boasts excellent healthcare facilities including a regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple championship golf courses, and comprehensive shopping amenities. The area combines Mediterranean charm with modern infrastructure, making it increasingly popular among foreign buyers seeking retirement homes, investment properties, or vacation retreats. With property values appreciating at 8% year-on-year and prices 40% lower than comparable Spanish island markets, La Manga represents outstanding value for discerning investors.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum supermarkets, local markets
Restaurants: Diverse dining options from beachfront cafés to international cuisine

propertyFeatures.intro: PLAYA PRINCIPE represents the pinnacle of modern residential design in La Manga del Mar Menor. Each apartment is constructed to the highest Spanish building standards with premium materials and finishes throughout. The development showcases contemporary architecture complemented by Mediterranean aesthetics, ensuring properties maintain their appeal and value. ORMANDA's commitment to quality extends from structural integrity to aesthetic details, with every apartment featuring thermal efficiency, modern amenities, and thoughtful layouts designed for comfortable living.
features: Private/communal swimming pool with resort amenities
Air conditioning pre-installation for easy retrofit
Double glazing with thermal break for energy efficiency

content.investmentSection: PLAYA PRINCIPE represents a compelling investment opportunity in one of Spain's fastest-growing coastal markets. La Manga del Mar Menor has demonstrated consistent appreciation with property values increasing at 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing national averages. The development's strategic location, combined with ORMANDA's reputation for quality construction, positions PLAYA PRINCIPE for strong long-term value growth. The rental market remains robust, with comparable properties commanding €800 per week for short-term lettings, offering excellent returns for investors seeking income-producing assets. Remarkably, PLAYA PRINCIPE prices remain 40% below comparable properties in Spanish island markets like Mallorca and Ibiza, providing extraordinary value. The established international community and English-speaking population create consistent demand from both European retirees and holiday home investors. With the coastal property market showing no signs of slowing, PLAYA PRINCIPE offers a rare combination of affordability, appreciation potential, and lifestyle benefits.
whyBuySection: Strategic coastal location in La Manga del Mar Menor with 20-minute beach access
Trusted developer ORMANDA with proven track record in the region
Exceptional value: 40% less than Spanish island markets
Strong investment fundamentals: 8% year-on-year property appreciation
Scheduled delivery: June 1st, 2026 with 10-year structural warranty

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in PLAYA PRINCIPE?
faqs.answer: PLAYA PRINCIPE apartments are priced from €205,033. The development offers 1-3 bedroom apartments ranging from 78 to 130 square meters built area. Prices vary based on specifications, location within the development, and floor level. Contact our sales team for detailed pricing on specific units and current availability.

faqs.question: When will PLAYA PRINCIPE be completed?
faqs.answer: PLAYA PRINCIPE will be completed on June 1st, 2026. ORMANDA provides a 10-year structural warranty covering all new properties. Staged delivery allows some units to be available earlier. Contact us for specific delivery schedules for individual apartments.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of PLAYA PRINCIPE?
faqs.answer: ORMANDA is the developer behind PLAYA PRINCIPE. They have an established track record of building quality residential developments throughout La Manga del Mar Menor and the surrounding Murcia region. ORMANDA maintains high construction standards and provides comprehensive after-sales support to property owners.

faqs.question: Is La Manga del Mar Menor a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, La Manga del Mar Menor is an excellent place to buy property. The area features an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making integration straightforward for foreign buyers. Property values show 8% year-on-year appreciation, and prices remain 40% below comparable Spanish island markets. Excellent amenities include regional hospital within 30 minutes, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, and several championship golf courses.

faqs.question: How far is PLAYA PRINCIPE from the beach?
faqs.answer: PLAYA PRINCIPE is within 20 minutes of multiple Blue Flag beaches. La Manga's unique geography provides access to both Mediterranean Sea beaches and Mar Menor lagoon beaches, offering diverse water activities and stunning coastal scenery. Beachfront amenities, water sports facilities, and beach restaurants are easily accessible by car or short bus rides.

faqs.question: What amenities are near PLAYA PRINCIPE?
faqs.answer: PLAYA PRINCIPE benefits from excellent nearby amenities including Mercadona, Lidl, and Consum supermarkets for shopping, regional hospital within 30 minutes for healthcare, several championship golf courses for recreation, multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, international schools in the region, and diverse restaurants ranging from local tapas bars to international cuisine establishments.

faqs.question: Can foreigners buy property in PLAYA PRINCIPE?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreigners can purchase property in PLAYA PRINCIPE without restrictions. EU citizens have equal rights to Spanish nationals. Non-EU citizens may require additional documentation and should consult with legal advisors regarding visa implications. Our team can provide guidance on the purchasing process and connect you with English-speaking legal professionals experienced in Spanish property transactions.

faqs.question: What is the rental potential of PLAYA PRINCIPE apartments?
faqs.answer: PLAYA PRINCIPE apartments offer strong rental potential, with comparable properties in the area commanding approximately €800 per week for short-term lettings. The well-established tourist infrastructure, international community, and coastal appeal create consistent demand for holiday rentals. Many owners successfully generate income through seasonal letting or year-round furnished rental programs.

content.conclusion: PLAYA PRINCIPE by ORMANDA represents a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality apartment in one of Spain's most desirable coastal locations at exceptional value. With prices from €205,033—40% below comparable island markets—combined with 8% year-on-year property appreciation and strong rental potential, PLAYA PRINCIPE delivers compelling investment fundamentals alongside superior lifestyle benefits. The June 2026 delivery date provides an ideal timeline for securing your slice of La Manga del Mar Menor's thriving international community. Whether you're seeking a permanent residence, vacation home, or investment property, PLAYA PRINCIPE's strategic location, quality construction, and established community make it an outstanding choice. Contact us today via WhatsApp to discuss your requirements, view available units, and learn how PLAYA PRINCIPE can become your gateway to Mediterranean living. Our multilingual team is ready to guide you through every step of the purchasing process.
